summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the reassessment and reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. , for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from the south line of University Street to the south line of Massachusetts Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by planking and sidewalking the same upon proper foundation, as provided for in Ordinance No. 10729, under Ordinance No. 32906 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
